title: Israeli-Palestinian tensions soar amid new wave of violence
description: In Tel Aviv, Israeli police say they shot dead an attacker who rammed his car into tourists, killing one person. This morning, Israeli jets pounded targets in Gaza and southern Lebanon. NBC News’ Raf Sanchez has more details on the wave of violence.

title: Car ramming attack and shooting in Israel, West Bank kill 3 people as violence rises
description: JERUSALEM — Palestinian militants carried out a pair of attacks on Friday, killing three people and wounding at least seven as tensions soared after days of fighting at Jerusalem’s most sensitive holy site.

title: At least one dead, six wounded in attack on Tel Aviv Promenade
description: Israel's foreign minister reports that at least one person is dead and six more are hurt after an attack at the Tel Aviv Promenade. Israeli police say the attacker has been neutralized. NBC's Raf Sanchez reports.

title: In Brazil, grief-stricken parents bury their children killed in ax attack
description: BLUMENAU, Brazil — They sent their seven-year-old to day care Wednesday and plunged into the deepest nightmare of any parent’s life.

title: Germany and France join EU proceedings against Hungary over anti-LGBTQ law
description: BERLIN, April 6 — Germany and France are joining the EU Commission’s infringement proceedings against Hungary over its anti-LGBTQ law, a German government spokesperson said Thursday.

title: Schumer and McConnell condemn Russia's detention of reporter Evan Gershkovich
description: Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer and Minority Leader Mitch McConnell condemned Russia's detention of Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich.

title: Pope Francis says sex is a beautiful thing and it's 'normal' to meet people on Tinder
description: Using dating apps like Tinder to meet potential partners is “normal” and the Catholic Church’s teaching about sex is “still in diapers,” Pope Francis said in a new documentary released this week.

title: Vending machine in remote Japan town sells meat from intruding bears
description: A vending machine in a remote Japanese town sells meat from Asian black bears that were caught in traps or in the mountains by hunters.

title: U.S. delegates travel to Taiwan despite tensions with China
description: Despite rising tensions with China, a bipartisan group of U.S. delegates met with Taiwanese officials in Taipei just days after House Speaker Kevin McCarthy met with Taiwan’s president in California. NBC News’ Janis Mackey Frayer explains what the meetings were focused on and how they could impact relations between the U.S. and China.

title: Syrian refugee is elected mayor of German village
description: Ryyan Alshebl, 29, fled Syria in 2015 and arrived in Germany as an asylum seeker. Now a German citizen, Alshebl has just been elected as mayor of the village of Ostelsheim, claiming it's a victory for "tolerance."

title: China sanctions Reagan library and others over Taiwanese president's U.S. trip
description: China announced several sanctions after Taiwanese President Tsai met with US House Speaker Kevin McCarthy, citing "the encouragement of seperatist activities".

title: Bear meat vending machine lures tourists to remote Japanese town
description: In an attempt to promote itself, one remote Japanese town has come up with a novel idea – selling wild bear meat provided by local hunters in a vending machine.

title: Israel launches rare airstrike on south Lebanon in response to rocket attack
description: Israel launched rare strikes in southern Lebanon early Friday, marking a widening escalation in the region following violence this week at Jerusalem’s most sensitive holy site.

title: Macron urges China's Xi to help bring about Ukrainian peace talks
description: French President Emmanuel Macron has urged Chinese President Xi Jinping to help facilitate peace talks between Russia and Ukraine. NBC News' Claudio Lavanga reports.

title: How this grueling battle could guide Ukraine’s future
description: Ukrainian defenders are holding out in Bakhmut even as Russian forces advance. Ahead of a spring offensive, NBC News looks at why Bakhmut matters.

title: Xi Jinping is willing to speak to Zelenskyy, E.U. chief says
description: China’s Xi Jinping expressed willingness to speak to Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelenskiy, the head of the EU said on Thursday.

title: Israel stages rare strikes in Lebanon and also hits Gaza Strip
description: Israel struck targets in southern Lebanon early Friday and resumed air strikes in the Gaza Strip, the Israeli military said, marking a further escalation in the region.

title: Israeli forces strike Gaza Strip
description: Israeli Defense Forces are launching airstrikes on the Gaza Strip with the attacks coming after dozens of rockets were fired into Israel by Lebanon in what's believed to be a response to an Israeli police raid at a mosque in Jerusalem. NBC’s Raf Sanchez reports.
